# Character Replacement

## Reference: Asciidoc Text replacements

`@source: https://docs.asciidoctor.org/asciidoc/latest/syntax-quick-reference/#text-replacements`

* Copyright: (C) ©
* Registered: (R) ®
* Trademark: (TM) ™
* Em dash: -- —
* Ellipses: ... …
* Single right arrow: -> →
* Double right arrow: => ⇒
* Single left arrow: <- ←
* Double left arrow: <= ⇐

Except when present in code block like `i--` or:

```c
i--
```
